entry.title: Kata for software developers
entry.summary: Build a blog with VuePress. With static site generator, it's pretty easy to build your own blog. If you're familiar with Vue, VuePress could be a good choice. Even though you've never used vue before, you can still use the out-of-box theme.

entry.title: Kottpd — HTTP Server in pure Kotlin
entry.summary: In today’s post I would like to talk about one of the projects I’m working on. I define it as light HTTP framework and it is made in pure Kotlin. Based on these two f ...
